title: The Saxon Tapestry
description: Alternate cover edition of ISBN-10 & ASIN 1559701587 / ISBN-13 978-1559701587Woven around the figure of Hereward the Wake, this book tells the story of the final tragic end of Anglo-Saxon England. Hereward's boyhood in the fens of East Anglia unfolds against a background of intrigue and ambition as the ailing Edward the Confessor prepares for death.
author: Sile Rice
